Trade/Device Name(s): Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Calibrator/Control Level 1
Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Calibrator/Control Level 2
Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Calibrator/Control Level 3
Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Calibrator/Control Level 4
Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Control Negative
Emit II Plus Specialty Drug Control Positive
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Emit II Plus Buprenorphine Assay and specialty calibrators/controls for buprenorphine detection in urine using homogeneous enzyme immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative and/or semiquantitative analysis of buprenorphine in human urine in laboratories, as a preliminary screening test; calibrators/controls are for calibration and quality control of the assay.
